title: PMS 2.0 511 - Thursday Night Football Preview, Justin Tucker, Ian Rapoport, & Jeff Saturday
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys chat about tonight's Thursday Night Football showdown between the Rams and Seahawks, and how he's trying to get back on the winning side of his same game parlay on Fanduel, what everyone is expecting from the game, some other bets that are appetizing tonight, and they cover last night's NFC Mega Bowl Playoff Baseball game. Joining the program is a Super Bowl Champion, 6x All-Pro, 4x Pro Bowler, NFL record for longest FG in a game, Baltimore Ravens K, Justin Tucker. Pat and Justin talk about his record setting kick against the Lions, if he hears the comparisons between himself and Adam Vinatieri, and they really get into some of the science behind the kicking game (12:13-30:02). Next, NFL Network Insider Ian Rapoport joins the show for his weekly Rapsheet Wrap Up. Pat and Ian chat about the mechanics of Stephon Gilmore going to Carolina, Jaylon Smith signing with the Packers, what he's expecting from tonight's game, some different injury statuses around the NFL, and everything else we need to know going into week 5 of the NFL season (32:05-1:04:34). Later, Super Bowl Champion, 6x Pro Bowler, 4x All-Pro,  member of the Indianapolis Colts Ring of Honor, and current ESPN analyst, Jeff Saturday joins the program to chat about line play in today's NFL, his relationship with Peyton Manning, his thoughts on his time in Green Bay, how he navigated being in the NFLPA and helping spur the end of the NFL lockout, and some old stories from the locker room (1:04:38-1:32:04). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
